system.description:
Your academic study and your connection to the natural world have allowed you to understand the flow of magical energy through the world better than most spellcasters. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u67vj764a5luq9au]{Leyline Awareness} option for the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sygit0xifd4lbg3g]{Natural Demeanor} feature. If you already have it, you gain a second option for the Natural Demeanor feature.
  • Half your druid levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of determining what spell slots you can recover with @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iqlgotutphoratct]{Arcane Recovery}.
  • Half your wizard levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3jdfihvtbyhbv9ez]{Wild Shape} feature.
  • When you are in wilderness surrounding or when you are in a location of great arcane power (Narrator’s discretion, but may include places such as growth of magical crystals or plants, magical schools, and the like) you can teleport a distance up to your Speed to an unoccupied space you can see instead of moving.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in druid, 3 levels in wizard
